name: QuakeSpasm

artifacts.preflight:
preflight do
    # There is no sub-folder; the root *is* the folder
    FileUtils.mv(staged_path.children, staged_path.join("QuakeSpasm").tap(&:mkpath))
  end

caveats:
To complete the installation of quakespasm, you will have to copy the file 'pak0.pak' and
'pak1.pak' from your Quake 1 installation support directory into /Applications/QuakeSpasm/id1/
